actions.description: This is where an action description would go. You would just have a string of characters here explaining what it does and then maybe some flavor later, sue me.

This is where an action description would go. You would just have a string of characters here explaining what it does and then maybe some flavor later, sue me. This is indeed different from the other action description, you are not paranoid.

inventory.description:
Rarity: Uncommon
Tags: [Equipment: Single-Handed Gauntlet] [Active] [Magical][Damaging][Passive Stat Increase]
Requires Attunement:
While Attuned gain +1 to intelligence.
Uses: Once per long rest
Crafted from thin, flexible, plana-infused steel, this gauntlet feels as if you’re wearing nothing at all.
Judgment of Balance
For 3 actions, snap your fingers with the gauntlet-worn hand, causing a spectral steel balance scale to manifest in your grasp. Choose yourself and one other creature up to 1 zone away—you decide who will embody Light and who will embody Sound.
The Creature of Sound becomes deafened, mute, and encumbered.
The Creature of Light becomes blinded.
This effect lasts until the end of the next round.
Just before Judgment of Balance ends both creatures must then make a contested Intelligence check. The winner tips the scales in their favor, causing the loser to suffer 3d8 psychic damage.
